name: Wolfenstein 1.02 Demo Movie File
summary: Learn about .DM_83 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Earlier versions of Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory store recordings as .DM_82 files, while later versions save recordings with a .DM_84 extension.

description: Recording of a game played in Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory (v. 1.02), a first-person 3D action game; records the gameplay of a mission and can be played back later using the program's "Replays" option.
